sentences.en: All parts are machined from top grade, high tensile aluminium.
sentences.cn: 所有零件都是用顶级高强度铝加工而成。

sentences.en: At this point, tensile fracture partially occurred, as evidenced by some apparent necking.
sentences.cn: 这时, 一些明显的颈缩现象表明,发生了局部拉伸断裂.

sentences.en: Certain materials can be manufactured with a high tensile strength.
sentences.cn: 有些材料可以制造成抗拉强度大的产品。

sentences.en: If the deposit is on the inside of the c, the macrostress is tensile.
sentences.cn: 如果沉积层是处于C形的内面, 宏观应力是拉伸型的.

sentences.en: Mild steel has a high tensile strength, this being about 200 times that of concrete.
sentences.cn: 软钢的抗张强度大, 约为混凝土的200倍.

sentences.en: One tends to develop a feeling that anything of a tensile nature is detrimental in fatigue.
sentences.cn: 人们往往会有这样的感觉;在疲劳中,一切具有拉伸性质的都是不利的.

sentences.en: Results were obtained only for a surface layer on the tensile side of the plate.
sentences.cn: 只能在板的受拉侧的表面层得到结果.

sentences.en: Tensile member forces in pinjointed frames are designated positive.
sentences.cn: 枢接构架中,拉力构件的力规定为正.

sentences.en: The circumferential normal stress is tensile.
The condition of uniaxial stress is closely approximated in prismatic bars subjected to pure axial tensile.
sentences.cn: 单轴的应力状态跟棱柱杆承受单纯轴向拉伸十分近似.

sentences.en: The resistance of the nonwoven to tensile rupture is the sum of two resistances in parallel.
sentences.cn: 非纺织物对拉伸断裂的阻力是两个并联阻力之和.

sentences.en: The specimen deforms under a tensile stress applied parallel to the fibres.
sentences.cn: 试样在平行于纤维的张应力作用下发生变形.

sentences.en: This shape allows only tensile strain.
sentences.cn: 这种形状使膜片只允承受拉伸压力.

sentences.en: We would like to know the tensile stress in the wall.
sentences.cn: 我们很想知道壁内的拉应力.

words.tran_cn: 张力，拉力；紧张，不安；电压
[力]拉力的；可伸长的；可拉长的

phrases.tran_cn: 拉伸，拉伸伸长；延伸率，抗张伸展率
拉伸模量；定伸强度；抗张模量
拉力试验机；抗张强度测定仪
拉力试验机；张力试验机

trans.tran_cn: 拉力的，张力的，可伸展的，可拉长的
trans.tran_en: able to be stretched without breaking
